BadgeDetail.Name: Digital Literacy
BadgeDetail.Description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated they are able to work within a digital society. They are able to effectively use spreadsheets, presentation applications, and word processing tools to create digital content.They know how to manage their online identity, use digital devices, applications, and services; and are able to use technology effectively and safely.

Task.Title: Driving Licence
Task.Body: Pass the Barclays Digital Driving license and upload your completion certificate.
Task.HtmlBody: Pass the Barclays Digital Driving license and upload your completion certificate.
Task.TextileBody: Pass the ["Barclays Digital Driving license":https://www.digitaldrivinglicence.barclays.co.uk/] and upload your completion certificate.
